resources.string: Knowing the draughtsboard coordinates is a very important skill:
Most draughts courses and exercises use the fieldnumber notation extensively.
It makes it easier to talk to your draughts friends, since you both understand the "language of the draughtsboard".
You can analyse a game more effectively if you donâ€™t need to search where the fieldnumbers are.
A fieldnumber appears on the board and you must click on the corresponding square. You have 30 seconds to correctly map as many squares as possible!
